gig init
stdout 'Initialized empty Git repository in .git'

! gig branch awesome
stderr 'reference to HEAD not found'

gig add hello.txt
gig commit -m 'Initial commit'

gig branch
! stdout 'awesome'

gig branch awesome
gig branch
stdout 'awesome'

! gig branch -D
stderr 'branch name required'

! gig branch -D master
stderr 'cannot delete checked out branch'

gig branch -D awesome
gig branch
! stdout 'awesome'

-- hello.txt --
hello world
